actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the lynx moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lynx can make another Claws attack against it as a bonus action.
actions.name: Claws

specialTraits.description: The lynx can cast clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.
specialTraits.name: Lynx's Sight (1/Day)

specialTraits.description: The lynx has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in undergrowth or snowy terrain.
specialTraits.name: Woodland Camouflage
